original_text: For while we are still in this tent, we groan, being burdened—not that we would be unclothed, but that we would be further clothed, so that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.
korean_text: 참으로 이 장막에 있는 우리가 짐진 것 같이 탄식하는 것은 벗고자 함이 아니요 오히려 덧입고자 함이니 죽을 것이 생명에 삼킨 바 되게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: For while we are still in this tent,
not that we would be unclothed,
but that we would be further clothed,
sentences.korean_translation: 더 옷을 입게 되기를 원하는 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: so that what is mortal may be swallowed up by life.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 죽을 것이 생명에 삼켜지게 하려 함입니다.
